about_the_game:
Welcome to Hakuba!


Immerse yourself in the extraordinary world of Hakuba School, where every students are unique animals. In this emotionally charged visual novel game, you'll embark on a thrilling journey that combines humor, darkness, intrigue and heartwarming friendships. Uncover the hidden pasts of your friends, explore a multitude of dialogue choices, and navigate around the school.

A Vibrant Cast:

Encounter a diverse and colorful cast of over 20 characters, each with their distinct personalities. Form meaningful connections with these students, unraveling their unique backgrounds, personalities, and struggles.

A Twisted Tale:

Delve into a story that balances humor and darkness, keeping you on the edge of your seat. As you navigate the halls of Hakuba School, choices you make will shape the fate of not only the protagonist but also the lives of those you encounter.

Unlocking Hidden Pasts:

Dive deep into your captivating backstory and those of your friends, peeling away the layers of mystery that shroud their lives... Aside from the central mysteries, Hakuba School is brimming with hidden stories, conspiracies, and personal journeys, ensuring 3-4 hours of gameplay.

Go around the school !:

Explore Hakuba School! Roam freely through the school's hallways, classrooms, and hidden corners.
